name: Desktop Baseball
description:
Watch as your desk transforms into a baseball stadium!
Come for the simple controls, stay for the deep strategy.
Customize your team down to the uniforms, bats, and pitches and then aim for the big leagues!
 
[Practice Game]
Play the old ball game however you like.
Set the number of innings to play as long as you want.
 
[Friendly Game]
Up to 2 players can play.
Step up to the plate and bat with all your might against your friends!
There are plenty of stadiums from regular ones to theme parks for you to take a swing in!
 
[Team Selection]
Put together a team for the ages.
Freely change the names and numbers on jerseys.
Create your dream team!
 
[Tournament]
Beat the competition to take a swing at the Nationals!
Hoist that trophy!
 
[Capsule Pitch]
Obtain awesome uniforms and more by earning points from different game modes!
There are plenty of unique items to collect!
 
[Mini Game]
Score big in the home run derby!
Get a perfect for a bonus prize.
